title: Clinton Expressed Support For "Medicare For All" On The 2008 Campaign Trail (Republican Party)
text: ( Source : Republican Party ) When Asked By A Yale Medical Student If She Would Support A Single-Payer Health Care System In February 2008 , Clinton Said She Would If It Were Politically Feasible. 'In New Haven on Monday, a fourth-year Yale
